name: ETH-OLAS
detail: Get XDAI-OLAS LP tokens on Ethereum and bond into the Olas protocol.

name: XDAI-OLAS
detail: Get XDAI-OLAS LP tokens on Gnosis Chain. Bridge them back to Ethereum and bond into the Olas protocol.

links.headerText: BRIDGE – OLAS FROM ETHEREUM TO GNOSIS CHAIN
BRIDGE – LP TOKEN FROM GNOSIS CHAIN TO ETHEREUM

name: MATIC-OLAS
detail: Get XDAI-OLAS LP tokens on Polygon. Bridge them back to Ethereum and bond into the Olas protocol.

name: ARB-OLAS
detail: Get ARB-OLAS LP tokens on Arbitrum. Bridge them back to Ethereum and bond into the Olas protocol.
